name: Fantasy Mosaics 4 - Art of Color
description:
Experience a world of multi-color mosaics puzzles! This exciting innovation opens up a whole new dimension of fun and challenge.

Discover beautiful vivid images cleverly hidden in the pattern of numbers and colors.

Embrace the new fun challenge of mosaics and take a journey across the new fantasy landscape to help our penguin find his soul mate.


100 multi-color puzzles also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.
